benchmark_details.name: Chat2Scenario: Scenario Extraction From Dataset Through Utilization of Large Language Model
benchmark_details.overview: Chat2Scenario is a framework leveraging large language models to extract scenarios from naturalistic driving datasets, facilitating scenario validation for automated driving systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance the efficiency of scenario extraction for validating automated driving systems using large language models.

data.source: highD dataset comprising vehicle trajectories on German highways collected via drones.
data.annotation: Manually generated semantic labels through analysis.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the comparison of extracted scenarios against ground truth labels.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision indicates fewer false positives, while recall reflects the model's ability to identify true scenarios.
methodology.validation: Validated through simulations in Esmini and CarMaker.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data anonymization procedures are not specified.
